title: Optimal Environmental Design for Vision Protection in Children’s Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental visual health concepts and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Experimental process measuring visual protection effects across display types (PC, tablet, smartphone), font sizes, and viewing durations via VR simulation

learning_goals: Learners can explain recommended viewing distances (≥33cm) and font sizes (16pt-18pt) across display types
Learners can design optimal learning environments based on viewing time using experimental data
Learners can evaluate display settings meeting PPD (pixels per degree) 60+ conditions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
